Overlay and accessibility permission is not granted!
Note: This overlay will close automatically in 25 seconds. Please cancel the USSD response dialog manually.

Frequently Asked Questions


1. What is accessibility service?

üëâ Accessibility service is originally designed to help the user with disabilities. In this application, accessibility service is used to parse the response of USSD dialog box and extract the important information only to make the user experience better.


2. What is an Overlay?

üëâ An Overlay is used to display content over another application. In this application, screen overlay is used to hide the normal USSD loading dialog with a custom loading screen to improve the user experience.


3. How to enable accessibility service in the Settings?

üëâ In the Samsung devices, users can navigate to Settings > Accessibility > Installed Services > Mero Sim > Turn it On to enable accessibility service. You need to follow similar steps in other devices.


4. How to enable overlay in the Settings?

üëâ In the Samsung devices, users can navigate to Settings > Apps > Mero Sim > Appear on top > Allow permission to enable overlay service. You need to follow similar steps in other devices.


5. Pin scanning does not work properly. What to do?

üëâ Here are some thing that you can try:

  • In low light situation, turn on the flash.
  • Try to capture the clear image of recharge card.
  • Try to position the recharge card in the center of the image.
  • Ensure that recharge card is scratched properly.
  • Edit the pin code in the confirm details section if there is few mistakes in recognition.

6. This application asks for a lot of permission. What are their uses?

üëâ Permissions and their uses:

  • CAMERA : To scan the pin code
             
  • CALL_PHONE : To make USSD request directly
             
  • SEND_SMS : To send SMS to activate or deactivate services
             
  • READ_CONTACTS : To fetch the recipient\'s phone number from contacts
             
  • VIBRATE : To vibrate the device if pin is scanned successfully
             
  • READ_PHONE_STATE : To detect the inserted SIM cards
             
  • SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW : To show overlay to hide USSD loading dialog
             
  • ACTION_MANAGE_OVERLAY_PERMISSION : To open overlay settings from the application directly

7. Does this application collects my sensitive data and sends to 3rd-party websites?

üëâ Mero Sim Application does not collect any kind of sensitive data in any way. The INTERNET permission is only used to show ads. The cached data do not leave the user\'s device.
